Content.Text:
<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>! <MYNAME>, hang in there!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NICKNAME>! <NICKNAME>, hang in there!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's about time you woke up. You're at the clinic,
honey.
<PAGE>
Don't you remember? You collapsed.
<PAGE>
I'm <BLUE>Marian</BLUE>, by the way. I'm the town doctor. It's
a pleasure to meet you, honey.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmph. People could save themselves a lot of
hardship if they only knew their limits. You
should learn yours.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't you think that's a touch harsh, <BLUE>Angela</BLUE>? It's
just a little youthful vim and vigor overstepping
its bounds, right?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Well then, don't work until you collapse next
time. Hauling you back to the clinic was
exhausting.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyway, you look fine now honey, so you're free
to go. Take care!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's about time you woke up. You're at the clinic,
honey.
<PAGE>
Don't you remember? You collapsed.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So this must be <MYNAME>, the new farmer
who moved here, right?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's right! What a little darling, don't you
think?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't really care. <MYNAME>, I would thank
you not to collapse again. Hauling you back to
the clinic was exhausting.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goodness, child, the words coming out of your
mouth could freeze a cup of coffee. Don't mind
her, honey.
<PAGE>
Anyway, you look fine now, so you're free to go.
Take care!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's about time you woke up. You're at the clinic,
honey.
<PAGE>
Don't you remember? You collapsed.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You certainly seem to be the careless sort. I
suggest you use better discretion in the future.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, come, child. Don't be so harsh. <MYNAME>
is our patient, you know, and patients need
tenderness to heal both mind and body.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're being too forgiving, doctor. As for you,
<MYNAME>, I would thank not to make me haul
you back to the clinic again.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't worry, <MYNAME>. She's hittin' you with
her sharp tongue now, but you should've seen
her fuss and worry over you.
<PAGE>
Anyway, you look fine now, so you're free to go.
Take care!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's about time you woke up. You're at the clinic,
honey.
<PAGE>
Don't you remember? You collapsed.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
How could you cause the doctor trouble like
this? Doctor, as his wife, let me apologize for
this.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's all right, honey. Don't worry about it.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I WILL worry about it, thank you! It's obvious
that he needs to be more aware of his
responsibilities as a farmer, as well as his limits.
<PAGE>
However, I'll be sure to give him a thorough
lecture on the subject later tonight. Am I clear,
<NICKNAME>?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ooooh my. Sounds like you're in for a tongue
lashing, <MYNAME> honey.
<PAGE>
Anyway, you look fine now, so you're free to go.
Take care!
